 3get_position <- function(adress) {
 4  url <- paste0("https://www.geocoding.jp/api/?v=1.1&q=", adress)
 5
 6  lat <- read_html(url) |>
 7    html_nodes("lat") |>
 8    html_text()
 9  lng <- read_html(url) |>
10    html_nodes("lat") |>
11    html_text()
12  lat <- if_else(is.na(lat), "0", lat)
13  lng <- if_else(is.na(lng), "0", lng)
14  # wait
15  Sys.sleep(10)
16  return(tibble(lat = lat, lng = lng))
17}
18
19get_position_vec <- function(adress_vec) {
20  adress_vec |>
21  map_dfr(\(vec) get_position(vec))
22}

 1calc_binomial <- function(n, p) {
 2    x = seq(1, n, 1)
 3    y = dbinom(x, n, p)
 4    val_mean = sum(x * y)
 5    val_var = sum(x * x * y) - val_mean ^ 2
 6
 7    tibble(x = x, y = y) |>
 8    ggplot(aes(x, y)) +
 9    geom_line() +
10    geom_point() +
11    geom_segment(aes(x = val_mean, xend = val_mean,
12    y = 0, yend = dbinom(val_mean, n, p))) +
13    theme_bw() +
14    ggtitle(glue::glue("n = {n}, p = {p}")) +
15annotate("text",
16    x = val_mean + 10, y = max(y),
17    label = glue::glue("Mean = {val_mean}, Variance = {val_var}"))
18}
